name: Hop Along Counting
overview: How many bunnies can you count? Pick the right number and tuck them into bed. All that children need is a little encouragement, and their natural curiosity about numbers will take over. They'll love sending Mommy rabbit around the field to find the correct number of baby bunnies. They'll be proud when they lead the bunnies to the matching burrow and watch them hope one by one into their bunny beds.
